name: GridLit
description:
The world is bathed in darkness. Light of all colors has fled from here, and shadowy entities rule over the dusk. Arrange your feeble light producers to generate greater and greater brilliance, until you can one day challenge the eldritch nightmares that hold your land captive.

Greetings! This is my first submission to a game jam, and is more of a prototype than an actual game at this point. I will be continuing development on it after the game jam judging period is over, so stay tuned!
